entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer service. Please hold while I connect you with an agent.
Finally! I've been on hold forever. I need to return something.
Thank you for calling VeloFit, my name is Sarah, how can I help you today?
Yeah, hi Sarah, I want to return a VeloBand Pulse. I bought it a little over two weeks ago, and it's just not working out for me.
Okay, I can help with that. Could you please provide me with your order number or the email address associated with your purchase?

Thank you. One moment while I pull up your order… Okay, I see your purchase of the VeloBand Pulse. According to our system, you purchased it 15 days ago. I'm so sorry about this, but our return window for electronics is 10 days.
What?! Ten days? Seriously? I thought I had at least two weeks! That's ridiculous. I really need to return this. It's practically brand new!
I understand your frustration. I wish I could make a full refund in this case. Let me see if a policy exception can be made.
A policy exception? What does that even mean? Just take the stupid thing back!

I understand, sir/madam, I do. While a full refund is not possible according to company policy since it's past the return window, I can offer you store credit for the full purchase price of the VeloBand Pulse. That way, you can still find something else you like from VeloFit.
Store credit? Ugh. Fine. I guess that's better than nothing. So, how does that work? I can use it online or in-store?

Yes, you can use the store credit either online or in one of our VeloFit retail locations. I will process the store credit right now and send an email to [email protected] with a unique code and instructions on how to redeem it. Would you like me to do that now?
Yeah, okay, fine. Send it. Thanks.
You're very welcome. It has been sent. Please allow 5-10 minutes for the email to arrive. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, I think that's it. Thanks for your help... and the store credit.
You're very welcome! Thank you for choosing VeloFit. Have a great day!
